subject: CNN Alerts: bush

CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Australia's Howard plans Asia-Pacific Kyoto successor

06/07/07 01:04 AM, EDT
Australia's Prime Minister John Howard has called for an Asia-Pacific replacement to the Kyoto pact, naming an envoy to work with regional leaders on a new climate agreement ahead of a September summit in Sydney.
FULL STORY
